backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping requested features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s role in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component setting up theme support and rendering header, converter, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ConverterSection: Manages SVG input state and triggers conversions, wiring Input, Output, and Preview sections.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright text and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header showing app title and icon.
frontend/src/components/InputSection.tsx: Allows pasting or uploading SVG paths with validation and calls back on changes.
frontend/src/components/OutputSection.ts: Displays converted clip‑path outputs with tab switching and copy-to-clipboard controls.
frontend/src/components/PreviewSection.t: Renders input SVG path and output clip‑path previews with tabs for mode and format selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management through an AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required, exporting nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/pathConverter.ts: Converts SVG path strings into CSS clip-path path() or polygon() formats with validation and basic path parsing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests for an SVG-to-clip-path converter tool.
